title: Hacker pls help me
body:
[8:05] skuxxbrazz: OI 
GIFT ME 
OR U WONT GET UR ACC BACK 
[8:13] Emanrox720: Shhhhh now :)
no really please leave me alone
[8:14] skuxxbrazz: ok ur getting hacked
[8:15] Emanrox720: copy and paste to Riot

so could someone help me out with this ooorr...

replies.body: Just change your password if you're afraid of getting hacked, and unfriend that person immediately.

>ok ur getting hacked

lol

Anyway, just report them. As long as you haven't shared your password with anyone, then your account shouldn't be hackable at all. If you're concerned, then read [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) and [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account).
